```{r, message=F, echo=F}
library(Seurat)
library(scCustomize)
library(dplyr)
library(Signac)
```


```{r}
A673 <- readRDS(file = "../working_data/A673_seurat.rds")
CHLA10 <- readRDS(file = "../working_data/CHLA10_seurat.rds")
TC71 <- readRDS(file = "../working_data/TC71_seurat.rds")
```

```{r}
Idents(A673) <- "condition"
Idents(CHLA10) <- "condition"
Idents(TC71) <- "condition"
```

```{r}
a_frame <- subset(A673, idents = c("vehicle", "TGFB1", "TGFB2"))
c_frame <- subset(CHLA10, idents = c("vehicle", "TGFB1", "TGFB2"))
t_frame <- subset(TC71, idents = c("vehicle", "TGFB1", "TGFB2"))
```

```{r}
saveRDS(a_frame, "../working_data/a673_tgfb_seurat.rds")
saveRDS(c_frame, "../working_data/chla10_tgfb_seurat.rds")
saveRDS(t_frame, "../working_data/tc71_tgfb_seurat.rds")
```
